alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 9:16PM CST until January 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to flood stage early Monday afternoon cresting at 20.0 feet. The river is then forecast to fall below flood stage by Monday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
